channel.description: Recent content in workshop on Wind and Bones

item.title: The Stories That Make Us: Addressing Domestic Abuse Through Storytelling
item.description: This weekend we’re getting started on our new project with Bulgaria’s Emprove Foundation, working on a storytelling project with women survivors of domestic abuse. The project is funded by British Embassy, Sofia, and is the first of its kind in Bulgaria.
